question: Wearing salwar kamiz is ok?
answer:
QUESTION
Firstly, salwar kamiz covers a women's body , fully. Which all the other dressed such as the pant and shirt does not, i f u say that salwar kamize shows the body, then what are we supposed to wear, A salwar kamize covers a women 's body head to toe( including the hijaab) . of coures ,in some cases, if a women wear really tight cloths and iit shows, then , is still better than weraing pant and shirt
ANSWER


Share:
Respected Sister-in-Islam

Assalaamu Alaykum Wa Rahmatullaahi Wa Barakaatuhu

Merely covering the body is not sufficient to fulfil the requirements of Hijaab. The purpose of Hijaab is also to conceal the form and shape of the body and to avoid the lustful glances of males which may be caused by the attractive colours of the Shalwar and Kamees.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
